title: Remake system is flawed.
body:
Had 3 games so far where we had an afk/dc from the start... they reconnected then dc again before the 3 minute mark and in two of the cases they have been afk the entire game, 0 xp, 0 cs, 0 movement... but it has not let us remake at 3 minutes because of them reconnecting the one time... even though they were afk the whole game. Isn't this super flawed?

Also I just played a game where we got first blood (and another kill very soon after) and the other team was allowed to remake, I thought if a kill happened you couldn't remake?

replies.body: I don't know how the system works personally so I can't comment but do you have a screen shot? Send in evidence when you think something might be a bug to support you're problem.
